title: A Deeply Supervised Semantic Segmentation Method Based on GAN. (arXiv:2310.04081v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: In recent years, the field of intelligent transportation has witnessed rapid advancements, driven by the increasing demand for automation and efficiency in transportation systems. Traffic safety, one of the tasks integral to intelligent transport systems, requires accurately identifying and locating various road elements, such as road cracks, lanes, and traffic signs. Semantic segmentation plays a pivotal role in achieving this task, as it enables the partition of images into meaningful regions with accurate boundaries. In this study, we propose an improved semantic segmentation model that combines the strengths of adversarial learning with state-of-the-art semantic segmentation techniques. The proposed model integrates a generative adversarial network (GAN) framework into the traditional semantic segmentation model, enhancing the model's performance in capturing complex and subtle features in transportation images. The effectiveness of our approach is demonstrated by a significant boo

translated_title: 基于GAN的深度监督语义分割方法
translated_abstract: 最近几年，智能交通领域得到了快速发展，受到了自动化和交通系统效率不断提高的需求的推动。交通安全是智能交通系统中的重要任务之一，需要准确地识别和定位各种道路元素，如道路裂缝、车道和交通标志。语义分割在实现这个任务上起着关键作用，因为它能够将图像分割成具有准确边界的有意义的区域。在本研究中，我们提出了一种改进的语义分割模型，将对抗学习的优势与最先进的语义分割技术相结合。所提出的模型将生成对抗网络（GAN）框架集成到传统的语义分割模型中，提高了模型在捕捉交通图像中复杂和微妙特征方面的性能。实验证明了我们方法的有效性。
tldr: 本论文提出了一种基于GAN的改进语义分割模型，能够准确地识别和定位交通图像中的复杂和微妙特征。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an improved semantic segmentation model based on GAN, which accurately identifies and locates complex and subtle features in transportation images.
